channel.title: A pretty good way of getting your self out of trouble
channel.description: You can ask jagex right after the money you bought is recived that what happend. Tell them surprisinly I logged back in and I found a load of gold. Then tell the to keep it under servalince for a few days just to trick em and see if anyone else logs in.

item.title: A pretty good way of getting your self out of trouble
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“ZeroDegrease, post:21, topic:188051”][quote author=OmidSan link=topic=250711.msg2118719#msg2118719 date=1205890864]
Uh… Ok, did I even say that?
[/quote]Are you a complete idiot?[/quote]
NO I think you are. I looked through all my posts on here and I never said that. Also I never use bold. So i’m not an idiot. =]

Read full topic
item.source: A pretty good way of getting your self out of trouble

item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Taharok:

I see no retardation in someone that actually has the brain to create an intelligent and worthwhile post, Cruzer.

That’s what you get when you’re a moron.

item.source: A pretty good way of getting your self out of trouble

item.title: A pretty good way of getting your self out of trouble
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

Ok this quoting thing is getting to big.
He’s just trying to take the easy way out. I wasn’t even really trying to change his mind, just showing him that he was wasting his hard-worked money on something really stupid

Read full topic
item.source: A pretty good way of getting your self out of trouble

item.title: A pretty good way of getting your self out of trouble
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“OmidSan, post:15, topic:188051”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=250711.msg2112509#msg2112509 date=1205654823]

To prove your retardation.

Lol

I see no retardation in someone that actually has the brain to create an intelligent and worthwhile post, Cruzer.

You shouldn’t be a 'tard and do that kind of stuff in the first place. Who wastes money to buy pixelated items in a friggin game? Someone with NO LIFE

Actually lots of my friends have and they are pretty cool and have a life…My friend has bought more than 100 mil but he’s cool.

He has job so he dosen’t really care.

wow your friend is a fucking retard.

Not really. His money his choice.

At least he pays for his own stuff instead of living off someone else’s money so i’ll give him that.
He works for his money-That’s good
But he spends it on the wrong things.

Well, think about it. Runescape to him is like an Xbox360 with CoD4 online and halo2 online. With assasins creed so to him it’s good.
[/quote]
Lol halo 2 online. Except for those games they are different instead of runescape being one game. It’s just 1 freaking game. Halo 3, COD4, assassin’s creed. All different.[/quote]
Well if he dosen’t think it’s a waist don’t bother trying to change his mind

Read full topic
item.source: A pretty good way of getting your self out of trouble

item.title: A pretty good way of getting your self out of trouble
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

He is saying that if you buy gold from someone simply tell jagex that someone got on your account and put it there without your knowledge. Also tell them to watch your account for the next few days and this will lead them away from you getting banned.

Read full topic
